source_translation: having a strong, attractive body
example: He’s a well-built man with broad shoulders, likely from years of swimming.

source_translation: the natural color and texture of the skin on a person's face
example: She has a clear, glowing complexion that makes her look younger than she is.

source_translation: quiet and shy, choosing to spend time alone rather than with others
example: Being introverted doesn't mean he's unhappy; he just prefers small gatherings.

source_translation: showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise
example: She is meticulous about her appearance, never leaving the house with a hair out of place.

source_translation: untidy or dirty in appearance
example: He turned up to the interview looking a bit scruffy in an unironed shirt.

source_translation: having a compelling charm that inspires devotion in others
example: The charismatic leader managed to win over the crowd within minutes.

source_translation: using words in a clever and funny way
example: He is known for his witty remarks that always lighten the mood.

source_translation: small natural indentations in the flesh on a part of the human body, especially the cheek
example: She has adorable dimples that show whenever she smiles.

source_translation: tending to forget things or not notice things because you are thinking about something else
example: The absent-minded professor forgot his briefcase in the taxi again.

source_translation: gracefully thin
example: The dancer had a slender but strong physique.

target_translation: khắc kỷ, chịu đựng thầm lặng
source_translation: enduring pain and hardship without showing one's feelings or complaining
example: He remained stoic throughout the trial, showing no emotion even when the verdict was read.

source_translation: short, stiff hairs growing on a man's face when he has not shaved for a few days
example: He had a bit of dark stubble on his chin by late afternoon.

source_translation: fond of company; sociable
example: Being a gregarious person, she thrives in large social gatherings and parties.

source_translation: small, pale brown spots on the skin, often from being in the sun
example: The little girl has a light dusting of freckles across her nose.

source_translation: attractively small and thin (usually used for women)
example: She is quite petite, so she often has to buy clothes in the junior section.

source_translation: believing that people are motivated purely by self-interest; distrustful of human sincerity
example: He's grown cynical about politics after years of broken promises.

target_translation: không để ý đến, thờ ơ
source_translation: not aware of or concerned about what is happening around one
example: She was so absorbed in her book that she was oblivious to the noise around her.

target_translation: dễ bị kích động, căng thẳng
source_translation: very nervous and easily upset
example: The high-strung racehorse was spooked by the sudden movement in the crowd.

target_translation: ánh mắt sắc sảo, nhìn thấu
source_translation: eyes that look very closely at you, making you feel as if they can see your secrets
example: The detective had piercing blue eyes that seemed to see right through my lies.

target_translation: tự ti, e dè (về bản thân)
source_translation: feeling undue awareness of oneself, one's appearance, or one's actions
example: He felt self-conscious about his accent when speaking in front of the class.

source_translation: able to adapt or be adapted to many different functions or activities
example: As an actor, he is incredibly versatile, moving easily from comedy to intense drama.

target_translation: dáng đi khom lưng, ngồi thõng vai
source_translation: to stand, move, or sit in a lazy way with your shoulders bent forward
example: Stop slouching! Stand up straight so you look more confident.

source_translation: showing care and effort in your work or duties
example: A diligent student, she stayed after class every day to finish her projects.

source_translation: extremely unpleasant, especially because of being rude or loud
example: The group at the next table were being obnoxious, shouting and making a mess.

source_translation: short, with a strong, solid body
example: The rugby player had a stocky build, making him very difficult to knock down.

source_translation: excessively proud of oneself; vain
example: He's so conceited that he thinks every woman in the room is looking at him.

source_translation: (of a man's face) having strong features that are attractive in a tough way
example: He has the rugged good looks of someone who spends a lot of time outdoors.

source_translation: unconventional and slightly strange
example: Our neighbor is an eccentric old man who talks to his plants every morning.

source_translation: full of energy and enthusiasm
example: She has a vibrant personality that fills the room as soon as she enters.

source_translation: a mark left on the skin after a wound or burn has healed
example: He has a small scar on his forehead from a childhood accident.

target_translation: tháo vát, có tài xoay xở
source_translation: having the ability to find quick and clever ways to overcome difficulties
example: A resourceful manager, she found a way to finish the project even after the budget was cut.

target_translation: tóc ở trán bị thưa/hói dần
source_translation: hair that stops growing at the temples and above the forehead
example: He’s only thirty, but he already has a noticeably receding hairline.
collocations: start to have a receding hairline

source_translation: having or showing sharp powers of judgment; astute
example: She made some shrewd investments that made her a millionaire within a decade.

source_translation: ungracefully thin and tall
example: The lanky teenager seemed to be all arms and legs as he walked across the court.

source_translation: showing an ability to understand and share the feelings of others
example: Being an empathetic listener is the most important trait for a counselor.

source_translation: (of a person) somewhat fat or of heavy build
example: He was a short, stout man with a friendly, round face.

source_translation: given to sudden and unaccountable changes of mood or behavior
example: The capricious weather made it impossible to plan an outdoor wedding.

source_translation: cheeks that curve inwards, often due to thinness or age
example: His hollow cheeks gave him a tired and gaunt appearance.

source_translation: tending to keep a firm hold of something; clinging or adhering closely
example: She is a tenacious advocate for human rights, never giving up on a case.

source_translation: having the qualities of a young person; looking young
example: At seventy, my grandmother still has a very youthful spirit.

source_translation: cheerful and friendly
example: The jovial host made sure every guest had a drink and felt welcome.

source_translation: having the head and shoulders bent forward
example: The old man walked with a stooped posture, leaning heavily on his cane.

target_translation: sưng sỉa, ủ rũ (do giận dỗi)
source_translation: bad-tempered and sulky; gloomy
example: He gave a sullen reply and refused to look at anyone after losing the game.

source_translation: having wide shoulders
example: He is tall and broad-shouldered, looking every bit like a professional athlete.

target_translation: hay thay đổi, không kiên định
source_translation: changing frequently, especially as regards one's loyalties, interests, or affection
example: The public can be fickle; one day they love you, and the next they've forgotten you.

source_translation: sending out light; shining or glowing brightly
example: She looked radiant in her white wedding dress.

source_translation: not friendly or forthcoming; cool and distant
example: He stayed aloof from the other guests, standing alone in the corner of the room.

source_translation: (of facial features) strongly and clearly defined
example: The model was known for his chiseled jawline and high cheekbones.

source_translation: showing a lack of experience, wisdom, or judgment
example: It was a bit naive of him to think that he could finish the project in one day.

source_translation: having a clean and tidy appearance
example: He is always well-groomed, with neatly combed hair and polished shoes.

source_translation: calm and in control of your feelings
example: Despite the pressure of the live interview, she remained perfectly composed.

source_translation: a smile that expresses satisfaction or pleasure about having done something or knowing something that is not known by everyone
example: He had a self-satisfied smirk on his face when he found out he had won.
collocations: wipe that smirk off your face

source_translation: behaving confidently and able to say in a direct way what you want or believe
example: You need to be more assertive if you want people to listen to your ideas.

source_translation: very thin, usually because of illness, not having enough food, or worry
example: After weeks of being sick, his face looked gaunt and his eyes were sunken.

source_translation: using words in a clever and funny way
example: He entertained the whole dinner party with his witty remarks and stories.

source_translation: to bring your eyebrows together so that there are lines on your face because you are annoyed or worried
example: She frowned in concentration as she tried to solve the difficult puzzle.

source_translation: not able to make decisions quickly and effectively
example: His indecisive nature makes him a poor fit for a high-pressure leadership role.

target_translation: sắc sảo, như nhìn thấu (ánh mắt)
source_translation: (of eyes or a look) appearing to see through someone
example: He has piercing blue eyes that make you feel like he's reading your mind.

source_translation: never thinking about things that are serious or important
example: I'm tired of superficial conversations about the weather; I want to talk about ideas.

source_translation: a fold of fat or loose skin under a person's chin
example: He’s gained a little weight lately and is starting to develop a double chin.

target_translation: hay thù hằn, muốn trả thù
source_translation: having or showing a strong desire for revenge
example: He is not a vengeful person; he prefers to forgive and move on.

source_translation: eyes that look deep in the head, often because of tiredness, age, or illness
example: His sunken eyes suggested he hadn't slept for more than a few hours in days.

source_translation: feeling or showing sympathy and concern for others
example: The nurse was known for her compassionate treatment of elderly patients.

target_translation: tóc sợi to, tóc rễ tre
source_translation: hair that has a thick diameter and feels rough to the touch
example: He has thick, coarse hair that is very difficult to style.

target_translation: nói nhiều, hay khua môi múa mép
source_translation: tending to talk a great deal; talkative
example: After a glass of wine, he becomes quite loquacious and tells long stories.

target_translation: yếu ớt, mảnh khảnh (thường do tuổi tác)
source_translation: (of a person) weak and delicate
example: Though she looked frail, her mind was still incredibly sharp.

source_translation: too eager to help or agree with someone more important than them
example: The waiter’s obsequious behavior was more annoying than helpful.

source_translation: small lines in the skin caused by old age
example: She has tiny wrinkles around her eyes that appear when she laughs.

source_translation: having or showing calmness in a crisis
example: Air traffic controllers must be unflappable to handle stressful situations.

target_translation: tư tưởng rộng rãi, khoáng đạt
source_translation: willing to understand and accept other people's ideas and opinions
example: My parents are quite broad-minded and were happy for me to travel alone.

source_translation: determined not to change your opinion or attitude
example: He's too stubborn to admit that he was wrong.

source_translation: fat; above the weight that is considered healthy
example: The doctor advised him to exercise more because he is slightly overweight.

source_translation: moving or doing things in a very awkward way
example: I'm so clumsy; I’ve already spilled coffee on my shirt twice today.

source_translation: having large, strong muscles
example: He has a very muscular build from spending hours at the gym.

source_translation: too interested in things that do not involve you
example: The nosy neighbor was always looking through her curtains to see who was visiting.

source_translation: having skin that is almost white because of illness, shock, or lack of light
example: You look a bit pale; are you feeling alright?

source_translation: saying only what you really think or feel
example: Please accept my sincere apologies for the mistake.

source_translation: wanting more money, power, food, etc. than you really need
example: Don't be greedy; leave some cake for the others!

source_translation: attractive and showing a good sense of style
example: She looked very elegant in her black silk dress.

source_translation: not thinking that you are better or more important than other people
example: Despite his great success, he has remained a very humble man.

source_translation: easily annoyed; in a bad mood
example: He’s always a bit grumpy in the morning before he has his coffee.

source_translation: slightly fat in a way that people think is attractive, especially of a child or a person's face
example: The baby has such adorable chubby cheeks!

source_translation: feeling or showing strong excitement or interest
example: The team was very enthusiastic about the new project proposal.

source_translation: having a brown skin color as a result of being in the sun
example: She looked healthy and tanned after her two-week holiday in Spain.

source_translation: expecting good things to happen or something to be successful
example: I’m optimistic that we can find a solution to this problem quickly.

source_translation: having little or no hair on the head
example: He decided to shave his head completely when he started going bald.

source_translation: giving or willing to give freely; given plentifully
example: It was very generous of you to pay for the whole dinner.

source_translation: hair that is not straight or curly, but has a series of curves
example: She has long, wavy hair that she usually wears down.

source_translation: that can be trusted to do something well; that you can rely on
example: We need a reliable person to take care of the house while we are away.

source_translation: untidy or dirty in appearance
example: He looked a bit scruffy in his old jeans and stained T-shirt.

source_translation: having a strong desire for success or achievement
example: She is an ambitious young lawyer who hopes to become a partner soon.

source_translation: physically strong, fit, and active
example: He has a very athletic build because he plays football and runs every day.

source_translation: covered with a messy collection of things
example: Though he is brilliant, his desk is always cluttered with papers.

source_translation: very pleasant or attractive
example: He gave us a charming smile and introduced himself.

source_translation: good at noticing things around you
example: An observant student noticed the small error on the whiteboard immediately.

source_translation: small and thin in an attractive way (usually of a woman)
example: She is quite petite, so she often wears high heels.

source_translation: carefully considering things; showing consideration for others
example: It was very thoughtful of you to send a thank-you note.

source_translation: (of a man) having strong, attractive features that look tough
example: He has the rugged good looks of someone who works outdoors.

source_translation: full of energy and life
example: She has a vibrant personality that makes everyone feel energized.

source_translation: honest and direct; easy to understand
example: I like him because he is very straightforward; you always know what he’s thinking.
